name: Geo city. a Test of NPC moral system
name_original: Geo city. a Test of NPC moral system
description:
This is a test for a school project, where my main focus has been to create a more dynamic dialog tree for the NPCs, granted I am not the biggest writer so don't expect great dialog.
If you want to participate in my test please use my questionnaire  before you play.
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScJr2_R68cFZPld69oiri0PW1h1bG9oQ3dgLpxK...
:)
